categories: Category:Events during the New Republic Era

nodes.text: The skirmish at Ankot Station took place when the smuggler Alfris Sotin proposed a deal to the Spice Runners of Kijimi, proceeding to then betray them to the Guavian Death Gang. A cell of the Spice Runners led by Tomasso sent Zorii Bliss and Poe Dameron to Ankot Station to meet Sotin, finding themselves under attack by Guavian soldiers. Bliss and Dameron managed to escape, also freeing several slaves Sotin had aboard his freighter, the Vondel.
